page.title: 06A DAY AT HOME
page.content: I woke up and I listened to my clock radio.It was 7.15am.At about half past seven i decided to get up I got dressed.Then I went down the stairs and watched the Saturday Picture Show.When I heard my clock radio switch I realised I had been mucking about for nearly an hour.After the program had finished I watched my dad playing our organ.He played money,money,money by ABBA, eight days a week by the Beatles and he also played save a prayer by Duran Duran. Then I watched chip's.As always some man did something wrong.In this program a poor man stole a car with his friend so he could get to work in time but the stolen car had some money and a tape that the owner of the car needed.At that point I switched off the T.V set.
